text: Stanislav Igorevich Nikitin (; born 22 June 1995) is a Russian freestyle skier. He competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics. His sister Liubov Nikitina is also a freestyle skier.Станислав и Любовь Никитины – чемпионы России в лыжной акробатике ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Freestyle skiers at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Russian male freestyle skiers Category:Olympic freestyle skiers of Russia Category:Universiade silver medalists for Russia Category:Universiade medalists in freestyle skiing Category:Competitors at the 2019 Winter Universiade
title: Stanislav Nikitin
